7af32537-859d-4fdf-859a-df5cf982a18b.description: The bearer of this certificate has successfully completed the SHE LOVES DATA Dashboard Foundation Program with Distinction and is deemed capable of designing, developing and deploying dashboards using TIBCO Spotfire*. They have demonstrated their proficiency in the essential functions and use of tools of the data visualisation software.
7af32537-859d-4fdf-859a-df5cf982a18b.name: She Loves Data Dashboard Foundations - DistinctionBadge

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 4 modules of online study as well as 4 assignments.
Module 1: Dashboard exploration as an end user. Marking and Filtering concepts
Module 2: Asking the right questions by understanding what data is important to answer the analytical business requirements. Foundations of charts and basic visualizations.
Module 3: Basic in Data cleaning, advanced visualizations, and connecting to multiple data sources
Module 4: Designing the dashboard for end-user consumption.

1b6e8fa7-2426-4f3f-a9f0-118360196671.description: The bearer of this badge has successfully completed the SHE LOVES DATA Dashboard Foundations Program and has acquired the foundation to be able to design dashboards using TIBCO Spotfire. They have demonstrated their proficiency in the essential functions and use of tools of the data visualisation software. The program’s content, consisting of four modules, is developed by Singapore Management University School of Information Systems.
1b6e8fa7-2426-4f3f-a9f0-118360196671.name: She Loves Data Dashboard Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 4 modules of online study as well as 4 assignments.
Module 1: Dashboard exploration as an end user. Marking and Filtering concepts.
Module 2: Asking the right questions by understanding what data is important to answer the analytical business requirements. Foundations of charts and basic visualizations.
Module 3: Basics in Data cleaning, advanced visualizations, and connecting to multiple data sources.
Module 4: Designing the dashboard for end-user consumption.  What will be the best design for my dashboard? Is the information displayed correctly? Do the right people have access to it?

405b3683-bc78-4932-bf2d-4f35f72c5abc.description: The bearer of this certificate has successfully completed the SHE LOVES DATA Intro to Python Signature Program. They have passed one (1) assessment test. The program is structured across 1 session. Week 1: Intro to Python
405b3683-bc78-4932-bf2d-4f35f72c5abc.name: Intro to Python Signature Program

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 1 online workshop and passed the assessment test.
Intro to Python serves as a foundation module to data analysis in Python.

e4f323f5-3fca-43ec-8037-ad4c49e692df.description: The bearer of this certificate has successfully completed the SHE LOVES DATA SQL Signature Program. They have passed two (2) assessment tests. The program is structured across 2 sessions Week 1: Intro to SQL and Week 2: Intermediate SQL.
e4f323f5-3fca-43ec-8037-ad4c49e692df.name: SQL Signature Program

badge_template_activities.title: Attended 2 online workshops and passed both assessment test
Intro to SQL: Common SQL Applications, Hands-on: Querying and Filtering, Agregate Functions - Slicing and Dicing
Intermediate SQL: SQL Data Type, Table Changes, Joins, Having vs Where

161802aa-0732-4f9d-a21b-679b4db19ceb.description: The holder of this badge participated and won the She Loves Data x MSD "You Are What You Eat!" Data Challenge, a global online data-thon, and has earned the highest points for either or both the Individual Quest and/or Group Challenge, using Tibco Spotfire.
161802aa-0732-4f9d-a21b-679b4db19ceb.name: "You Are What You Eat!" Data Challenge - Winner

badge_template_activities.title: This global “data-thon”, co-presented with MSD, was an exploration and analysis of the nutritional composition of various foods that helped us appreciate what real good or bad food look like, in data-terms. Predictive analytics were also used to derive insights on food classifications. Each participant completed either a group or an individual assignment and presented the findings back to a panel of judges.

86e9a86e-c20e-4a47-96a7-c3bf191f7897.description: FORECASTING FOUNDATIONS - PROGRAM OVERVIEW Forecasting is the process of making predictions based on past and present data and most commonly by analysis of trends. The program is structured across 4 sessions Module 1: Fundamentals of Forecasting. Module 2: Forecast Process. Module 3: Forecast Methodology. Module 4: Exploration of 'Why should I trust your Forecast?' .
86e9a86e-c20e-4a47-96a7-c3bf191f7897.name: Forecast Foundations - Distinction

c1e4a93e-b3c1-40c6-8e86-0cfa7bc77828.description: The holder of this badge participated in the She Loves Data x MSD "You Are What You Eat!" Data Challenge, a global online data-thon, and has completed either or both the Individual Quest and/or Group Challenge, using Tibco Spotfire.
c1e4a93e-b3c1-40c6-8e86-0cfa7bc77828.name: "You Are What You Eat!" Data Challenge - Participant

badge_template_activities.title: This global “data-thon”, co-presented with MSD, was an exploration and analysis of the nutritional composition of various foods that helped us appreciate what real good or bad food look like, in data-terms. Predictive analytics were also used to derive insights on food classifications. Each participant completed either a group or an individual assignment and presented the findings back to a panel of judges, and earned at least 60/100 points for each challenge.

86c058f3-5539-400b-9160-8a3b1b1674a2.description: FORECASTING FOUNDATIONS - PROGRAM OVERVIEW Forecasting is the process of making predictions based on past and present data and most commonly by analysis of trends. The program is structured across 4 sessions Module 1: Fundamentals of Forecasting. Module 2: Forecast Process. Module 3: Forecast Methodology. Module 4: Exploration of 'Why should I trust your Forecast?' .
86c058f3-5539-400b-9160-8a3b1b1674a2.name: Forecast Foundations

88da0505-3a99-479d-80e8-d6167c34fb4f.description: This award recognises volunteers who have lent their support to one or more teams or causes or in many capacities. This is a person who is first to respond to a call for help, the person who everyone relies on to keep things moving, or the person who always turns up to help in whatever way they can.
88da0505-3a99-479d-80e8-d6167c34fb4f.name: She Loves Data | Florence Nightingale Award, Runners-up

69a024fd-4250-4fab-91e5-273ff03528a3.description: This category recognises volunteers who have demonstrated leadership at any level in the organisation. They are the ones that organise people to come together to solve a challenge, and encourage teamwork. They mentor or share their expertise selflessly. It's not about them. It's about empowering the team. They don't dictate, they challenge others to be better volunteers.
69a024fd-4250-4fab-91e5-273ff03528a3.name: She Loves Data |Leadership Award

fe499c76-9eac-4a76-b33a-1c7d3c292a08.description: The Initiative award recognises a person who achieves impressive things. They are the trailblazers. They are passionately taking the first step towards making the world a better place.
fe499c76-9eac-4a76-b33a-1c7d3c292a08.name: She Loves Data | Shooting Star Award, Runners-up

10e93194-7be7-4b1d-9b3b-7bfb11d028e4.description: This award recognises volunteers who have lent their support to one or more teams or causes or in many capacities. This is a person who is first to respond to a call for help, the person who everyone relies on to keep things moving, or the person who always turns up to help in whatever way they can.
10e93194-7be7-4b1d-9b3b-7bfb11d028e4.name: She Loves Data | Florence Nightingale Award, Winner

39b9450d-7592-4f41-9a23-4d4f7b578914.description: This is a new category and our first award this year. We will toast the chapter or team that has made the most impact in 2022. This core chapter or team's volunteers are true champs, and these words come to mind when describing them: united, great initiatives and positive energy!
39b9450d-7592-4f41-9a23-4d4f7b578914.name: She Loves Data | Heroes Team Award

7b1866e2-9d20-4fff-b028-552fc7a6172c.description: This category recognises volunteers who have consistently lent their support to one or more teams or causes or in many capacities. They are the people who are first to respond to a call for help, the person who everyone relies on to keep things moving, or the person who always turns up to help in whatever way they can, even if they lead busy lives.
7b1866e2-9d20-4fff-b028-552fc7a6172c.name: She Loves Data | Most Dependable Award

628a96b7-8ac2-4e21-9d0d-6200d66a96ed.description: The leadership award recognises volunteers who have displayed leadership at any level of an organisation. This person has established, improved or grown a service, engaged others, built a team or built connections. They create change and inspire others to come on the journey with them.
628a96b7-8ac2-4e21-9d0d-6200d66a96ed.name: She Loves Data | North Star Award, Runner-up

276c7b0d-b32c-42d2-91b3-adcc820aca36.description: This category recognises volunteers who have only been in the organisation for 1.5 years or less, but have demonstrated their commitment and contributed significantly to the projects. Some of us may not have heard of them - they are new, after all, and may be a bit shy - but you have personally experienced how dedicated they are to our cause. What impressed you: how they showed up consistently in the last few months, actually did what they said they would do, and executed with excellence.
276c7b0d-b32c-42d2-91b3-adcc820aca36.name: She Loves Data | RISING STAR Award

a99ea593-f86a-4114-8b19-8ca4c6fe2e09.description: This is a volunteer who is new to our tribe. However, they have demonstrated exceptional commitment to our organisation and aspire to deliver their tasks with excellence in a short time.
a99ea593-f86a-4114-8b19-8ca4c6fe2e09.name: She Loves Data | Rising Star Award, Runners-up

dd1c29e4-5118-422e-94a5-5a6896da2431.description: This is a volunteer who is new to our tribe. However, they have demonstrated exceptional commitment to our organisation and aspire to deliver their tasks with excellence in a short time.
dd1c29e4-5118-422e-94a5-5a6896da2431.name: She Loves Data | Rising Star Award, Winner

29d2f6da-1ab8-4456-9a8e-45c9398b98b5.description: The Initiative award recognises a person who achieves impressive things. They are the trailblazers. They are passionately taking the first step towards making the world a better place.
29d2f6da-1ab8-4456-9a8e-45c9398b98b5.name: She Loves Data | Shooting Star Award, Winner

27667b12-73b6-4925-a022-2d89e45491e6.description: He or she has consistently represented our organisation well and is a role model who inspire others to live and lead with values. Their authenticity and positive attitude energise others. Their integrity commands respect - they get ahead without hurting others. You can see that they are in this out of a deep conviction and passion to help and change the world for the better, not just to "get exposure" or to advance their careers.
27667b12-73b6-4925-a022-2d89e45491e6.name: She Loves Data | WALK THE TALK AWARD

1c45cd08-6d7d-4e8a-a8db-bc1a8d642f85.description: The leadership award recognises volunteers who have displayed leadership at any level of an organisation. This person has established, improved or grown a service, engaged others, built a team or built connections. They create change and inspire others to come on the journey with them.
1c45cd08-6d7d-4e8a-a8db-bc1a8d642f85.name: She Loves Data | North Star Award, Winner
